articles.author: Rajesh Roy, Piyush Nagpal
articles.title: Car blast near New Delhi’s historic Red Fort kills at least 8 people, India’s police say - AP News
articles.description: Police in India's capital say that a car explosion near New Delhi's historic Red Fort has killed at least eight people and injured 19 others. The cause of the blast Monday near one of the gates of the Red Fort metro station remains unknown. Sanjay Tyagi, a sp…
articles.content:
NEW DELHI (AP) A car explosion near the historic Red Fort in Indias capital on Monday killed eight people and injured at least 19 others, police in New Delhi said.
The blast, which triggered a fire … [+2486 chars]
